text.quote: 000: Clause 27, page 39, line 42, leave out paragraph (a) and insert—
text.IndentOne: “(a) at a time when S is a senior manager in relation to a bank (“B”), S—
text.IndentTwo: (i) agrees to the taking of any decision or decisions or to the carrying on of activities by or on behalf of B in relation to the business of a group bank, or
(ii) fails to take steps that S could take to curtail such decision or decisions or activities,”

text.quote: 000: Clause 27, page 40, line 7, after “cause” insert “or contribute significantly to”
